testcase.classname: feature to Test Roles Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Add Sales Head Role functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the Security Module.......................................passed And User Click on the Roles screen..........................................passed And User click on the Add button............................................passed When The User enter the data in the Name field..............................passed Then User Select the Reporting manager......................................passed When User enter the Description.............................................passed And User Select the Mobile Access type toggle...............................passed And User Select the Sale Head approved or Reject permission.................passed Then The Added Sales Head Role should be displayed in the roles list........passed

testcase.classname: feature to Test Roles Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Add Sales Person Role functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the Security Module.......................................passed And User Click on the Roles screen..........................................passed And User click on the Add button............................................passed When User enter the data in the Name field..................................passed Then User Select the Reporting manager......................................passed When User enter the Description.............................................passed And User Select the Mobile Access type toggle...............................passed And User Add the Activity rights for Create Orders and View Orders..........passed And User Add the Activity rights for Create Collections and View Collections.passed And User Add the Activity rights for Create Return Orders and View Return Orders.passed Then The Added Sales Person Role should be displayed in the roles list......passed
